name: vue-vite-microfrontend
description: Vite + Module Federation is now possible

scripts.install:deps: pnpm install && pnpm --prefix ./host install --force && pnpm --prefix ./remote install --force
scripts.postinstall:deps: pnpm --prefix ./host run build && pnpm --prefix ./remote run build
scripts.preview:host: pnpm --prefix ./host run build && pnpm --prefix ./host run preview
scripts.preview:remote: pnpm --prefix ./remote run build && pnpm --prefix ./remote run preview
